api_list.name: way2mean_goals
api_list.description: Return mean number of goals for home and away teams. The input is 3way and under/over odds. They could with or without margin.

required_parameters.name: under
required_parameters.description: Odds that total number of goals less than "spec"

required_parameters.name: over
required_parameters.description: Odds that total number of goals more than "spec"

required_parameters.name: way2
required_parameters.description: Odds for away team to win

required_parameters.name: wayx
required_parameters.description: Odds for home team to draw

required_parameters.name: way1
required_parameters.description: Odds for home team to win

required_parameters.name: spec
required_parameters.description: Threshold for total goals in under/over odds. Could be only 0.5, 1.5, 2.5, 3.5, 4.5
